```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(cchsflow)
library(plotly)
library(srvyr)
library(survey)

plot_data <- harmonized_combined %>%
  select(year,Province, DHH_SEX, Age_Group, CCC_071,CCC_101,CCC_075,activity,HWTGBMI_der_cat4,
         Immigration,Alcohol,SMKDSTY_cat3,Risk_factor,WTS_M)

svy_plot <- as_survey_design(.data=plot_data, weights="WTS_M")

#2011 census population standardization (age and sex)
pop2011 <- c(4962765,3524640,3459035,1281440,917340,4910365,3649325,3593270,1393345,1352950)

```

```{r}
prev_plot <- function(design, sum_var, filter_value, stdpop, startyear, title){
  
  # Prevalence 
  table <- svystandardize(design,by = ~Age_Group+DHH_SEX, population = stdpop)%>%
    group_by(year,Immigration, {{sum_var}}) %>%
    summarise(Prevalence = survey_mean()*100) %>%
    filter({{sum_var}} == filter_value) %>%
    select(-Prevalence_se, -{{sum_var}})
  
  # Plot
  plot <- ggplot(table, aes(x=year, y=Prevalence))+
  geom_line(aes(colour=Immigration))+
  geom_point(aes(colour=Immigration)) +
  ylab("Prevalence (%)")+
  xlab("Year")+
  ggtitle(title)+
  labs(colours="Migration Groups")+
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5),
        # legend.position = "none", 
        # panel.grid.major = element_blank(),
        # panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
        # panel.background = element_blank(),
        axis.line = element_line(colour = "black"),
        panel.border = element_rect(colour = "black", fill=NA))+
  scale_y_continuous(limit=c(0,62))+
  scale_x_discrete(limits=c(2001,2005,2009,2013,2017))+ 
  scale_color_brewer(palette = "Paired")
  
  return(plot)
}
```


```{r Hypertension}
ht_plot <-prev_plot(svy_plot, CCC_071, 1, pop2011, 2001, "Hypertension")
ggplotly(ht_plot)
```

```{r Diabetes}
db_plot <-prev_plot(svy_design, CCC_101, 1, pop2011, 2001, "Diabetes")
ggplotly(db_plot)
```

```{r Blood cholesterol}
bc_plot <-prev_plot(svy_design, CCC_075, 1, pop2011, 2015, "High blood cholesterol")
ggplotly(bc_plot)
```

```{r Obesity}

ggplotly(bmi_plot)
```
